title: Is it permissible to give your Pets names & is there any restriction in this? assimalhakeem -JAL
transcript: is it permissible for us to give pets names and if so which names are permissible in islam from canada he says can we give names to our pets yes no problem is there any restriction not that i know of and you should not call your cat muhammad for example because this is an honorable name you can call it whatever you wish that is permissible and not degrading to any of the names that we um honor in islam and allah knows best
